main event: A white object resembling a baseball was sighted moving up through clouds at an altitude of 7,000 feet in Montezuma, Indiana, on November 20, 1957.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 10 minutes., The object was lost to sight as it ascended through the clouds., The object traveled in an easterly direction., Multiple conclusions drawn suggest it could have been a balloon or aircraft., There was insufficient data for a clear evaluation.
sighted object: A white object resembling a baseball
